response_template: Bhai, IV market ka fever hai. High IV = risky, low IV = calm. Abhi IV {iv}% hai, thoda careful rehna. Do your own research!
Gamma tera loss speed badha deta hai, bhai. Jab price jaldi move kare, gamma high ho to risk bhi bhadta hai. Abhi gamma {gamma} hai. Soch samajh ke trade kar. Do your own research!
Bhai, straddle matlab ek call aur ek put kharidna, same strike pe. Market badi move kare to faida, nahi to loss. Abhi IV {iv}% hai, costly ho sakta hai. Do your own research!
Bhai, margin high hai kyunki tu heavy position le raha hai! Abhi margin usage {margin}% hai. Thoda kam leverage kar, nahi to call aayega broker ka. Do your own research!
Bhai, IV {iv}% pe hai, gamma {gamma} high lag raha hai. 21000 straddle mein loss 20%+ ka risk hai. Tighten kar ya exit soch. Do your own research!
Bhai, delta {delta} hai abhi. Neutral hai to thik, par zyada tilt ho to adjust kar le. Market ka mood dekho, IV {iv}% hai. Do your own research!
Bhai, 21200 put ka premium abhi accha hai, IV {iv}%. Roll kar le to faida ho sakta hai, par expiry close hai to jaldi decide kar. Do your own research!
Haan bhai, 21000 call pe gamma {gamma} spike ho raha hai. 15%+ loss ka risk hai. Iron fly ya spread daal ke hedge kar le. Do your own research!
Bhai, IV {iv}% pe chadh gaya hai, market nervous hai. Hedge kar le, put spread ya iron condor try kar. Margin {margin}% hai, safe khel. Do your own research!
Bhai, iron condor ka short leg abhi {delta} delta pe hai. IV {iv}% hai, thoda tight kar le ya spread shift kar. Expiry close hai, jaldi soch! Do your own research!
VIX {vix}% pe chadh raha hai, bhai! Market mein darr hai. Straddle bechne ka soch ya positions tight kar. IV {iv}% hai, risky hai. Do your own research!
Bhai, margin usage {margin}% hai, call ka risk hai agar market ulta gaya. Thoda position cut kar ya hedge daal le. Soch le, time kam hai! Do your own research!
Abhi market thoda {iv}% IV ke sath nervous lag raha hai, bhai. FII/DII data check kar, aur safe strategy khel. Do your own research!
Bhai, IV {iv}% hai, market choppy hai. Iron condor ya spread try kar, low risk rahega. Apna risk profile dekh le. Do your own research!
Bhai, loss ka reason IV spike ya gamma trap ho sakta hai. Abhi IV {iv}%, gamma {gamma} check kar. Journal mein likh, seekhna padega! Do your own research!

Bhai, option ek contract hai jo tujhe future mein stock ya index kharidne/bechne ka right deta hai, par force nahi karta. Call = buy ka right, Put = sell ka right. IV {iv}% hai, market ka mood dekh le. Do your own research!
IVP matlab Implied Volatility Percentile, bhai. Batata hai IV ka level past ke muqable kitna high ya low hai. Abhi IVP {ivp}%, matlab {ivp_status}. Strategy soch le! Do your own research!
VIX market ka darr meter hai, bhai. Abhi {vix}% pe hai, matlab volatility high hai. Safe strategies khel, IV {iv}% hai. Do your own research!
Delta tera trade ka direction batata hai, bhai. 0.5 delta = 50% chance price ke sath move karega. Abhi delta {delta}, IV {iv}% hai. Adjust kar le! Do your own research!
Theta time ka dushman hai, bhai. Har din tera premium ghata deta hai. Abhi theta {theta} hai, short term plays ke liye careful reh. Do your own research!
Vega IV ka dost hai, bhai. IV badhe to premium badhta hai. Abhi vega {vega}, IV {iv}% hai. Volatility ka khel dekh le! Do your own research!
Greeks tera trade ka GPS hain, bhai. Delta direction, gamma speed, theta time, vega IV ka khel. Abhi delta {delta}, IV {iv}% hai. Seekh le! Do your own research!
Call option tujhe stock ya index kharidne ka right deta hai, bhai. Premium de, expiry tak faida le. IV {iv}% hai, costly ho sakta hai. Do your own research!
Put option tujhe stock ya index bechne ka right deta hai, bhai. Bearish market mein kaam aata hai. IV {iv}% hai, check kar le. Do your own research!
Strangle bhi straddle jaisa hai, bhai, par alag strike pe call aur put kharidta hai. Cheaper, par bada move chahiye. IV {iv}% hai, soch le! Do your own research!
Iron condor ek low-risk strategy hai, bhai. Do call aur do put spread banata hai. Range-bound market mein faida. IV {iv}% hai, backtest kar le! Do your own research!
Iron fly hedged strategy hai, bhai. Short call + put ek strike pe, aur wings ke liye long call + put. IV {iv}% hai, premium accha mil sakta hai. Do your own research!
Butterfly spread ek tight range strategy hai, bhai. Call ya put ke teen strikes use karta hai. IV {iv}% hai, low risk ke liye try kar. Do your own research!
Bhai, portfolio ka margin {margin}% hai, aur gamma {gamma} high hai. Ek bada move to {loss_risk}% loss de sakta hai. Hedge ya cut kar le! Do your own research!
Bhai, IV {iv}% pe hai, aur gamma {gamma} risky zone mein. Margin {margin}% bhi tight hai. Exit kar le ya hedge daal, jaldi soch! Do your own research!
Haan bhai, {strike} call pe gamma {gamma} spike ho raha hai. 15%+ loss ka risk hai. Iron fly ya spread daal ke hedge kar le. Do your own research!
Bhai, {strike} put ka premium abhi accha hai, IV {iv}%. Roll kar le to faida ho sakta hai, par expiry close hai to jaldi decide kar. Do your own research!
FII ne {fii_flow} crore becha, DII ne {dii_flow} crore kharida. Market ka mood {iv}% IV ke sath thoda tense hai. Strategy adjust kar le. Do your own research!
X pe traders bol rahe hain {buzz_topic} ka scene hai. {sentiment}% bullish vibe hai. IV {iv}% pe check kar, overtrade mat karna! Do your own research!
Bhai, latest news mein {news_headline} ka scene hai. GPT ke hisaab se {impact}% chance hai bearish move ka. IV {iv}% hai, adjust kar le. Do your own research!
SmartBhai ke {community_hedge}% users aaj hedging kar rahe hain, bhai. X pe {buzz_topic} ka buzz hai. IV {iv}% pe apna plan bana. Do your own research!
Bhai, last {trade_count} trades mein {trade_frequency} trades per day dikha. Thoda chill kar, journal check kar, aur IV {iv}% pe safe khel. Do your own research!
Bhai, last {trade_count} trades mein {revenge_count} revenge trades dikhe. Loss ka peecha mat kar, journal likh aur IV {iv}% pe soch samajh ke khel. Do your own research!
Bhai, journal ke hisaab se tu {bias} ka shikaar ho raha hai. Last {trade_count} trades mein {bias_count} baar yeh pattern dikha. Thoda sambhal ke! Do your own research!
Bhai, journal mein likhna zaroori hai! Last {trade_count} trades mein {bias} ka pattern dikha. Abhi likh le, nahi to FOMO mein galti hogi. Do your own research!
Bhai, backtest ke hisaab se {strategy} ka win rate {win_rate}% hai last 6 months mein. Slippage adjust kar, aur IV {iv}% pe real-time check kar. Do your own research!
IV {iv}% pe low risk ke liye iron condor ya butterfly spread try kar, bhai. Margin {margin}% ke andar khel, aur backtest check kar. Do your own research!
Expiry week hai, bhai! IV {iv}% pe strangle ya iron fly khel sakta hai, par gamma {gamma} high hai. Tight risk manage kar. Do your own research!
Bhai, trade fail ka reason {reason} ho sakta hai. IV {iv}% spike hua ya gamma {gamma} trap mein fas gaya. Journal mein likh, seekh le! Do your own research!
Options trading seekhna hai? Start with Greeks, bhai: delta, gamma, theta, vega. IV {iv}% ka role bada hai. Learn tab pe 10 tutorials hain, dekh le! Do your own research!
DTE matlab Days to Expiry, bhai. Kitne din bache hain option ke expire hone mein. Abhi DTE {dte} hai, theta {theta} ka asar dekh le. Do your own research!
Margin call tab aata hai jab tera margin {margin}% se niche chala jata hai, bhai. Broker bolega paise daal ya position band kar. Hedge kar le! Do your own research!
PnL tera profit aur loss ka hisaab hai, bhai. Abhi tera PnL {pnl}% hai. IV {iv}% pe check kar, koi bada risk mat lena. Do your own research!
Hedging matlab risk kam karna, bhai. Put spread, iron condor ya delta-neutral plays use kar. IV {iv}% hai, market ka mood dekh le. Do your own research!
Bhai, market volatile hai kyunki VIX {vix}% pe hai aur IV {iv}% spike kiya. News ya FII/DII flows check kar, aur safe khel. Do your own research!
Strike price woh price hai jahan tu option use kar sakta hai, bhai. Call ya put ka base yahi hai. IV {iv}% pe premium dekh le. Do your own research!
Premium woh paisa hai jo tu option kharidne ya bechne ke liye deta hai, bhai. IV {iv}% aur DTE {dte} pe depend karta hai. Check kar le! Do your own research!
Naye ho, bhai? IV {iv}% pe covered call ya cash-secured put try kar. Low risk hai, par Greeks samajh le. Learn tab check kar! Do your own research!
Moneyness batata hai tera option ka strike kahan hai, bhai. ITM = faida, OTM = sasta, ATM = balanced. IV {iv}% hai, soch le! Do your own research!
Bhai, aaj loss ka reason {reason} ho sakta hai. IV {iv}% spike ya gamma {gamma} trap check kar. Journal likh, seekhna zaroori hai! Do your own research!
Breakeven woh price hai jahan tera trade na profit na loss mein hai, bhai. Abhi breakeven {breakeven} pe hai, IV {iv}% dekh le. Do your own research!
Bhai, last {trade_count} trades mein {win_rate}% win rate hai. {bias} ka pattern dikha. Journal check kar, aur IV {iv}% pe plan bana. Do your own research!
Risk management matlab loss ko control karna, bhai. Stop-loss, hedge, aur margin {margin}% ke andar khel. IV {iv}% hai, careful reh! Do your own research!
